title: The easiest way to farm upvotes
body: Have something involving {{champion:202}} and the number 4 in your post.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kEpMPGH5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-27T23:19:35.236+0000)
>
> Jhin's ok with negative 4, right?

No, because to get to that, you actually need 5 downvotes provided you keep your own default upvote.
Keep this man at -4 downvotes. You disgrace the art of Jhin.

> [{quoted}](name=Windoges,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kEpMPGH5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-28T03:16:30.747+0000)
>
> Keep this man at -4 downvotes. You disgrace the art of Jhin.

But it required 5 downvotes to get me there.
the problem is, you actually have to be funny about it or tag along somebody else's jhin thread
